titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John Haly
CWG13684

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To John Haly, Dr.

186
Date of Purchase.
Dollars. Cents.
Febry 27 To one Wrought Iron cook Stove 75. 00
" " " 33 lb of Stove pipe for Same @ 22¢ 7. 26
" " " Putting up Same complete 1. 00
" " " One cannon coal Stove 14. 00
" " " 24 lb of pipe for Same @ 22¢ 5. 28
" " " Putting up Same complete 1. 00
" " " Sheet Iron for cannon Stove 1. 35
" " " 2 Cast Iron Oval Boilers 6. 00
" " " Elbows & cap Extra 1. 50
" " " Tea Kettle & Coffee Boiler 3. 00
$115. 39
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

Wm H. Gardner
Surgeon in Charge Hospital
Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 21st of March, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, One hundred & fifteen dollars and Thirty nine cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

20.
No 12.
No 45 Abstract. G
Jno Haly
Dollars 115 39/100
Paid March 21st 1864
Hospital
J 235
certif no 20
